channel.title: Virtuous: Redux - Shroak
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/shroak/virtuous-redux
This sounds a lot better in iTunes if you screw with the equalizer settings. [Here's mine for crystal-clear songs.](https://gyazo.com/38cb6fd3bbe7654ae14cdd51f4af0f1f)
Also, when are we getting actual electric guitars and orchestra sounds/percussion packs in Auxy? I got a hankering for making a D2-styled song and I don't wanna jury rig GarageBand sounds to make it happen. >;C

item.title: Virtuous: Redux - Shroak
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
This is a FAT industrial track, and I’m super into it. Great atmosphere, and that beat just stomps the whole way through. Excellent!

Read full topic

This sounds a lot better in iTunes if you screw with the equalizer settings. Here’s mine for crystal-clear songs.

Also, when are we getting actual electric guitars and orchestra sounds/percussion packs in Auxy? I got a hankering for making a D2-styled song and I don’t wanna jury rig GarageBand sounds to make it happen. >;C
